text: @spectatorindex @PMOIndia @CMofKarnataka @Karnataka_DIPR FYI... the first step to bring COVID19 is know early who is infected. So kindly increase capacity of per day testing KA to 1 lakh before it’s too late. If you cannot kindly step down.
